mapper.insert: insert into resume values (resume_seq.nextval, #{m_Id}, #{rs_Title},#{rs_Type}, #{rs_Pay}, #{rs_Workspace1}, #{rs_Workspace2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rs_Workspace3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rs_Job1}, #{rs_Job2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rs_Job3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsim_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rss_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsw_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsit_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rse_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsls_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rst_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsf_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rslg_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rspf_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsv_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rspr_Seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rs_Name},#{rs_Birth},#{rs_Gender},#{rs_Email},#{rs_Homenum},#{rs_Phone},#{rs_Address})
mapper.select: select M_name, M_birth, M_gender, M_email, M_homeNum, M_phone, M_address from member where M_id=#{memId}
mapper.update: update resume set (RS_TITLE, RS_TYPE, RS_PAY, RS_WORKSPACE1, RS_WORKSPACE2, RS_WORKSPACE3, RS_JOB1, RS_JOB2, RS_JOB3, RSIM_SEQ, RSS_SEQ, RSW_SEQ, RSIT_SEQ, RSE_SEQ, RSLS_SEQ, RST_SEQ, RSF_SEQ, RSLG_SEQ, RSPF_SEQ, RSV_SEQ, RSPR_SEQ) = (#{rs_Title},#{rs_Type}, #{rs_Pay}, #{rs_Workspace1}, #{rs_Workspace2}, #{rs_Workspace3}, #{rs_Job1}, #{rs_Job2}, #{rs_Job3}, #{rsim_Seq}, #{rss_Seq}, #{rsw_Seq}, #{rsit_Seq}, #{rse_Seq}, #{rsls_Seq}, #{rst_Seq}, #{rsf_Seq}, #{rslg_Seq}, #{rspf_Seq}, #{rsv_Seq}, #{rspr_Seq}) where RS_SEQ=#{rs_Seq} and M_ID=#{m_Id}
update resume set RSIM_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSS_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSW_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSIT_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSE_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSLS_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RST_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSF_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSLG_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSPF_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSV_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
update resume set RSPR_SEQ=#{tableSeq} where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
mapper.delete: delete from resume where RS_SEQ=#{rsSeq} and M_ID=#{mId}
